summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1588, for the improvement of North Thirty-seventh Street, in the City of Seattle, from Meridian Avenue to Woodlawn Avenue, by constructing concrete walks and wooden cross walks, under Ordinance No. 16880 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
